body: Having read the webcomic and manga, reading these sort of cheating doujins makes me feel kinda bad because ai-chan would never do that since it's made very clear she has strong feelings of love towards onii-san. Maybe I should just cope but that's my personal experience
Damn, so much hentai for a show that's only 3-4 minutes short.

@zspecter Literally the first chapter it shows her hands grabbing the bedsheets in a hotel room and making loud moaning noises, when she accidentally calls her friend. The next chapter, she sounds relieved when she mishears her friends and thinks they use lube when giving a titjob, too. She's 100% fucking that middle-age dude.

Oh ok, I have just read all the chapters I could find, and looks like there are some chapters that imply that she has already done it, or at least has done something, but there's also some chapters that imply that she hasn't done anything yet...
@SunsetSeeker Really? I only saw the anime and the a few chapters of the comics/manga, can you please tell me which chapter its implied that she started fucking the old guy?
Found Gold!!! Shota for the win hahahaha
Y'know what's even more fucked up than the shota? Ai is waaaay closer in age to these shotas than the middle-age man she's canonically fucking in the real series.
I really hate shota after reading this. It still good though
This would be incredible if it wasn't shotacon. Still pretty good though.
